about_the_game:
Cucumber is a jumping Cucumber Simulation Game, in which you will jump with your cucumber!
The Goal of the Game is to reach the highest possible jumping score with your cucumber.

Get a random cucumber every 3 hours and grow your fantastic cucumber collection!

What to expect?
- A big jumping cucumber
- A Jumpscore

Everyone was waiting to finally see a jumping cucumber and here comes your free chance!

Everyone was waiting to finally see a jumping cucumber and here comes your free chance!
name: Cucumber

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 100 MB GRAM
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 1 Ghz+
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 200 MB GRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Cucumber is a never before seen jump Game, in which you jump with a cucumber! Get a random cucumber every 3 hours and grow your fantastic cucumber collection!
